Cuerpo: Bershad does research in operating systems, distributed systems, networking, parallel systems, and architecture. A lot of his work has appeared in TOCS, SOSP, ASPLOS and ISCA, although he can't seem to get a SIGMETRICS paper published to save his life. Memory management for operating systems and architectures. Philipose, C. Chambers, S.J. Bershad. An Extensible Protocol Architecture for Application-Specific Networking Marc E. Fiuczynski and Brian N. Extensibility, Safety and Performance in the SPIN Operating System Bershad et.al. Romer, Ohlrich, Karlin and Bershad. This paper appeared in the 1994 Mobile Computing Workshop.
